penalty.description: Used to specify the norm used in the penalization. The ‘newton-cg’, ‘sag’ and ‘lbfgs’ solvers support only l2 penalties.

C.description: Inverse of regularization strength; must be a positive float. Like in support vector machines, smaller values specify stronger regularization.

dual.description: Select the algorithm to either solve the dual or primal optimization problem. Prefer dual=False when n_samples > n_features.
